ISSUE.TITLE: Command always detects one table
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: node -v ( xmysql requires node >= 7.6.0 ) v8.11.1 npm -v 5.6.0 mysql --version 8.0.11 xmysql --version 0.4.8 - - - When I run the command given in the README, the tool detecs one table only and generates 29 APIs, all of which are referencing a table named 'undefined', however the /tables API returns the correct database tables but their APIs are not generated. I tried on a database of mine as well as classicmodels database that is used in the tests. - - -

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixing #40: Handling mysql 8 results in caps!
Fixing #40: Handling mysql 8 results in caps!
